climbs.name: Green Machine
climbs.fa: ?-Some cool ass dudes (or dudettes) back in the day...

content.description: The problem is climbing out the northeast-facing, overhanging arete (obvious when you are there). Sit start as low as you can, and crank the hell out of those right foot heel hooks to link big left throws. It is a bit cramped being in the cave pit and all, but it is very good.
content.location: Park near the middle of the long pulloff/parking lot. Bushwhack south through bushes down a steep hill for a second. You are aiming for the next rock outcropping west of the main top rope area. Get on the uphill side of the outcropping and notice the neat cave/pit below you, go there.
